title: Elite Link Building Specialist
job_overview:
Company: Sunrise Recovery
Experience Required: Advanced, Proven Track Record

We are looking for a top-tier Link Building Specialist—not someone who just “knows about SEO,” but a true expert in high-authority link acquisition, strategic outreach, and advanced off-page SEO tactics. This position is for someone who understands algorithmic impact, domain authority growth, and long-term backlink strategies that drive real results.

What We Need:
 • Mastery of white-hat link-building techniques that ensure sustainable ranking improvements.
 • Experience with high-authority link acquisition, guest posting, and niche-specific outreach.
 • Expertise in broken link building, skyscraper techniques, and advanced competitor backlink analysis.
 • Deep understanding of Google’s algorithm updates, link equity, and trust flow metrics.
 • Proficiency in tools like Ahrefs, Majestic, SEMrush, and Google Search Console to track and optimize backlink profiles.
 • Ability to analyze and disavow toxic links to maintain a clean, powerful backlink profile.
 • Proven track record of securing placements on DR70+ websites and increasing domain authority through strategic partnerships.

What Matters Most:

We need someone who can prove they’ve built high-quality, high-impact backlink profiles that significantly boost rankings, authority, and organic traffic. If that’s you, show us:
 • Case studies of past link-building successes.
 • Before-and-after traffic and ranking improvements.
 • Examples of high-quality links you’ve secured (DR, niche, and traffic impact).

This role is for elite-level professionals only. If you know how to build powerful, sustainable links that Google rewards, we want you.
